name: Mirk
description:
A Dark World Adventure With a Beautiful Art Works And An Epic Story, kill The Ghosts , find the Key and Go to the portal to finish the game .

use arrows and space to shoot Jump and shoot on the right time , find the bow ,, and the key Then rush back to the gate in the right time
